titles.title: American Samoa Possession Tax Credit Act of 2003
To extend the possession tax credit with respect to American Samoa an additional 10 years.
American Samoa Possession Tax Credit Act of 2003

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: American Samoa Possession Tax Credit Act of 2003 - Amends Internal Revenue Code provisions to extend the possession tax credit, with respect to American Samoa, until December 31, 2015.
